mapper.select: SELECT id, name, phone, open_id AS openId, serial_number AS serialNumber, nick_name AS nickName, group_id AS groupId, status, gender, employee_level AS employeeLevel, join_date AS joinDate, identify_no AS identifyNo FROM WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( name, phone, open_id, session_key, serial_number, nick_name, head_cover, group_id, status, gender, employee_level, join_date, identify_no, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{phone}, #{openId}, #{sessionKey}, #{serialNumber}, #{nickName}, #{headCover}, #{groupId}, #{status}, #{gender}, #{employeeLevel}, #{joinDate}, #{identifyNo}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
